channel.title: Help with my server!
channel.description: hi guyz i need help with one thing in my server we want to make it so when mod's die they cant lose there stuff like admins so can some one plz help me thankz.

item.title: Help with my server!
item.dc:creator: @billyjr33 billyjr33
item.description:
@billyjr33 wrote:

yer but im making my mods like admins so they can pickup because i only got one mod on server and i cant make him admin because i got admins so thats why.

item.title: Help with my server!
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

I think that the way he asked was fine.

Also, I don’t recommend having Mods keep their stuff on death - although, this is my opinion.
